response_strategies.script: When you invest in our program, you're not just paying for classes, but investing in a comprehensive success pathway with personalized mentorship.
We offer multiple payment plans, early bird discounts, and performance-based scholarships to make quality education accessible.

common_objections.objection: I'm not sure about online classes

response_strategies.script: Our online classes offer recorded lectures, live interactive sessions, and 24/7 doubt-clearing support to ensure uninterrupted learning.
Why don't you try our 5-day free demo to experience our teaching methodology and interactive learning environment?
Our program complements school teaching, providing deeper insights, advanced problem-solving techniques, and comprehensive revision strategies.

competitive_exams.objection: I can prepare on my own

response_strategies.script: Self-study is challenging. Our structured program provides strategic guidance, expert mentorship, and proven success methodologies.

not_interested.text: I understand. Many of our current students felt the same initially but found value in a quick demo session.
No worries! Can I send you some information to review at your convenience?

budget.text: We have flexible payment options to fit most budgets. Can I share the details?
Would you be open to discussing our most affordable plan?

bad_timing.text: I understand that timing is everything. Would it be alright if I follow up with you at a better time?
We can schedule a demo at your convenience. When might work best for you?
